title: Sampler, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, cross and darning stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Vertical rectangle embroidered with seventeen horizontal bands of geometric or stylized floral design, in blue, green, pink and cream, now faded.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, cross and darning stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-907.
